stimulusHtml: The work was created by manipulating which of the following materials?

features.html: Â© Asian Art & Archaeology, Inc. / Corbis

choicesHtml: The bone of an animal considered to be a totemic species
Red terra cotta clay excavated from a sacred site
A difficult-to-carve mineral called jade, formed using precise sanding techniques
A hard sedimentary stone known as greywacke, shaped with stone tools
